modName: SkyRe - Compatibility Plugin for Regent Armory
summary: Adds SkyRe compatibility to the Regent Armory mod by Backstept.
descriptionHtml:
This is a SkyRe-compatible conversion of the \"Regent Armory\" mod by backstept. I did not make these weapons, but merely adjusted the stats and crafting recipes in order to make them friendly with SkyRe. My goal while doing the conversion was to keep as close to the original work as possible while making sure the balance fit SkyRe and a sense of player progression. Therefore, the swords with higher damage ratings have slightly higher requirements in order to craft them.

================
Details
================
- Armsman and Captain swords are classified as Longswords and have standard steel stats.
- Cavalry and Soldier are classified as Broadswords and have standard steel stats.
- Duke, Guardian, and Regent are all classified as Skyforge steel and thus require the ability to work the Skyforge and have stats equivalent to the Nord Hero gear you can craft from it.
- Meltdowns added for each sword.

================
Installation
================
Extract the version of the plugin that you want (Greatswords or Bastard Swords) to your Skyrim Data directory or use NMM/Wrye Bash. NOTE: Disable the original RegentSwords.esp and only use this plugin! Failure to do so will result in lots of duplicates and other conflicts.

================
Uninstallation
================
Delete the SkyRe_Plugin_RegentSwords.esp file from your Skyrim Data folder or use NMM/Wrye Bash to uninstall.

================
Links
================
Go here and get the original mods and files and ENDORSE them!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17250]Regent Armory[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]SkyRe-Skyrim Redone[/url]

================
Credits
================
backstept for Regent Armory
T3nd0 for SkyRe
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit

================
Version History
================
v 1.0(8/5/12) - Initial release.
author: Shadow_Paladin
